entity.name: Going Out
entity.description: This entity tracks all conversations about going out.

text: @briantylercohen She has Covid19, and she's going out to protest again . This is irreprehensible. She is endangering everyone she will come in contact  to, this is manslaughter.,and she should be arrested .
